name: Pistachio Almond Cranberry Thumbprint Cookies
description: Pistachio Almond Cranberry Thumbprint Cookies. A delicious and easy sweet treat, Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2 Tablespoons virgin coconut oil or organic canola oil or Earth balance butter
1/4 teaspoon cinnamon powder or spice of choice
jam or chutney for filling ((I used cranberry pear chutney))

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add hot water, flax meal and coconut oil. Mix well and let sit for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add hot water, flax meal and coconut oil. Mix well and let sit for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the vinegar, sugar, salt, agave and spices and mix for 2 minutes till well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the vinegar, sugar, salt, agave and spices and mix for 2 minutes till well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Grind the pistachios, almonds, walnuts separately using pulse so they dont become too buttery.
recipeInstructions.name: Grind the pistachios, almonds, walnuts separately using pulse so they dont become too buttery.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the ground nuts, and sift whole wheat flour and baking powder into the wet ingredients and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the ground nuts, and sift whole wheat flour and baking powder into the wet ingredients and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: The mixture will be a slightly stiff but still sticky dough. Add more flour if the mixture is more like a batter.
recipeInstructions.name: The mixture will be a slightly stiff but still sticky dough. Add more flour if the mixture is more like a batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Oil hands or spoon and shape into balls. Place on parchment and make a deep dent in the center.
recipeInstructions.name: Oil hands or spoon and shape into balls. Place on parchment and make a deep dent in the center.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F for 14-16 minutes depending on cookie size and thickness.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F for 14-16 minutes depending on cookie size and thickness.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool on rack. The cookies might be soft when right out of the oven but will solidify to a biscuity texture. Fill thumbprint with jam or any other filling of choice!
recipeInstructions.name: Cool on rack. The cookies might be soft when right out of the oven but will solidify to a biscuity texture. Fill thumbprint with jam or any other filling of choice!

itemListElement.text: Cook 3/4 cup cranberries and half a pear pureed with 1 Tbsp jaggery/raw sugar, ginger powder, cinnamon, pinch of salt till all cranberries pop and chutney thickens.
itemListElement.name: Cook 3/4 cup cranberries and half a pear pureed with 1 Tbsp jaggery/raw sugar, ginger powder, cinnamon, pinch of salt till all cranberries pop and chutney thickens.

keywords: easy cookie recipe, fruit cookies, vegan cookies
